channel.title: Dijure | Digital Architectures with a hint of Java
channel.description: Recent content on Dijure | Digital Architectures with a hint of Java
channel.copyright: Copyright © 2020 by Dijure LLC · All rights reserved · Some design elements by Themefisher. Select images from Unsplash. Created using Hugo.

item.title: Advisory
item.description: Assessment of your team’s migration toward cloud native, Kubernetes and distributed architectures. What’s your maturity model?

item.title: Workshops
item.description: Workshops that range from hours to days. Together we create an agenda of topics to help your team move forward.

item.title: Presentations
item.description: Organizing a conference, meetup, or company event? Choose from my porfolio of topics or create a new topic for your audence and agenda.

item.title: Multimedia
item.description: Based on you needs, presentations, workshops, and advisory sessions are arranged in a variety of forms. In-person, video conferencing, webinars, or podcasts. International travel.

item.title: Software Architectures
item.description: Have a difficult problem? Need a new feature? Need a skeleton for best practices. Tap into my experience in designing, developing, and delivering commercial applications.

item.title: Authoring
item.description: Need an article, technical white paper, how-to, or assessment? Tap into my experience for an unbiased look.

item.title: Hands On Labs
item.description: My workshops include hands-on training to reinforce learning. Choose from my portfolio of Katacoda scenarios. If you have some unique teaching moments, new scenarios can be delivered.

item.title: Gratis
item.description: A friend in need is a friend indeed. Do you host a meetup? Are you a student? A non-profit? A struggling open-source team? How can I help?
